data.title: Outstanding New OTR Professional Award
data.organization:
NODA (Association for Orientation, Transition, and Retention
in Higher Education) - Region V
data.description:
This award recognizes a new orientation, retention and transition professional who has demonstrated service to NODA and / or to the orientation, retention and transition profession. The award is based on the following:
  • Current NODA membership for at least one full year
  • No more than 4 years of professional orientation, transition and retention experience
  • Demonstrated commitment to (and shows promise of becoming a leader in) the field of orientation, transition, and retention.
  • Innovative contributions to the individual's institution.
  • Active participation at the regional and / or NODA Annual Conference.
The winners of this award at the regional level will automatically be considered for the same award at the national level.
